movie.title: Hostel
movie.description_intro: 3 backpackers are in Amsterdam where they get locked out of their youth hostel. They are invited into a man's house where he tells them of a hostel somewhere in eastern Europe where the women are all incredibly hot and have a taste for American men. When they get there, everything is too good to be true - the hostel is "to die for"
movie.description_full: 3 backpackers are in Amsterdam where they get locked out of their youth hostel. They are invited into a man's house where he tells them of a hostel somewhere in eastern Europe where the women are all incredibly hot and have a taste for American men. When they get there, everything is too good to be true - the hostel is "to die for"

movies.title: Ghostfinders
movies.summary: A group of television personalities, renowned for their popular show in which they hunt ghosts and other paranormal phenomenon, encounter a real-life haunting which proves to be more dangerous than anything they've portrayed on their show.
movies.description_full: A group of television personalities, renowned for their popular show in which they hunt ghosts and other paranormal phenomenon, encounter a real-life haunting which proves to be more dangerous than anything they've portrayed on their show.
movies.synopsis: A group of television personalities, renowned for their popular show in which they hunt ghosts and other paranormal phenomenon, encounter a real-life haunting which proves to be more dangerous than anything they've portrayed on their show.

movies.title: Classroom 6
movies.summary: A local reporter and her assembled TV crew go into a school haunted by a horrific past. The team spends the night locked inside the building, capturing any and everything they find.
movies.description_full: A local reporter and her assembled TV crew go into a school haunted by a horrific past. The team spends the night locked inside the building, capturing any and everything they find.
movies.synopsis: A local reporter and her assembled TV crew go into a school haunted by a horrific past. The team spends the night locked inside the building, capturing any and everything they find.

movies.title: Ginger Snaps Back: The Beginning
movies.summary: Set in 19th Century Canada, Brigette and her sister Ginger take refuge in a Traders' Fort which later becomes under siege by some savage werewolves. And an enigmatic Indian hunter decides to help the girls, but one of the girls has been bitten by a werewolf. Brigitte and Ginger may have no one to turn to but themselves.
movies.description_full: Set in 19th Century Canada, Brigette and her sister Ginger take refuge in a Traders' Fort which later becomes under siege by some savage werewolves. And an enigmatic Indian hunter decides to help the girls, but one of the girls has been bitten by a werewolf. Brigitte and Ginger may have no one to turn to but themselves.

movies.title: Feast III: The Happy Finish
movies.summary: The survivors are saved by the mysterious prophet, Short Bus Gus, who seemingly has the ability to control the beasts. He leads them into the sewers as they travel to the big city. Along the way they get help from karate expert Jean-Claude Seagal and learn that the beasts originate from a place called "The Hive." Armed with this knowledge, they decide to fight back and destroy the beasts once and for all.
